overview: Kimberly Jane Snodgrass works as Justin Rosenstein’s Executive Assistant at Asana. She comes from Olive Grove Consulting where she supported the CEO’s strategic planning, donor campaigns, and growth initiatives for client organizations. She was instrumental in developing the overall go-to-market strategy for Quilt. Kimberly is also the founder of REACH and on the Board of Together We Rise – two organizations focused on improving foster youth’s high school gradation rates. Kim holds a BA from UCI and an Ed.M from Harvard University’s Graduate School of Education.
